title: What are UFOs or UAPs? 37 theories. One infographic.
content:
UFOS (or UAPs Unidentified Aerial Phenomena) are all over the news.

But what are they? Extra terrestrials? Intra-terrestrials? Inter-dimensionals? Weather-balloons? Sundogs? Enemy drones? Secret military tech? Or something even stranger…?

Check out an infographic summary of all the major theories, from ordinary to out-there

The truth is in there. Maybe…
author: David McCandless
